scripts.start-all: concurrently "npm run start-common" "npm run start-manager" "npm run start-office" "npm run start-store"
scripts.start-common: cd common && npm install && npm run start
scripts.start-manager: cd manager && npm install && npm run start
scripts.start-office: cd office && npm install && npm run start
scripts.start-store: cd store && npm install && npm run start
